biotools.summary: annotate_my_genomes is a pipeline that aims to annotate genome-guided transcriptome assemblies from StringTie, coming from long read RNA-Seq alignments in vertebrate genomes (i.e. PacBio technology)

bioschemas.name: annotate_my_genomes
bioschemas.summary: annotate_my_genomes is a pipeline that aims to annotate genome-guided transcriptome assemblies from StringTie, coming from long read RNA-Seq alignments in vertebrate genomes (i.e. PacBio technology)
